"Dark Blast Skills":
"\"About Dark Blast Skills\"

Learning and improving Dark Blast Skills can be done by consuming Dedicated EXP.
You can earn Dedicated EXP by destroying enemies.
Dedicated EXP earned is shared across all characters on the same account.

Some Dark Blast skills have a Release Requirement that needs to be fulfilled and can be checked by selecting \"Skill Release Req.\"

â€»You cannot upgrade or learn skills during a quest.
